title: Strengthening Machine Learning Practical Competencies: Conceptual Model-Based Education for Fostering Design Thinking Dispositions

context.prior_knowledge: Basic problem-solving skills and experience in mathematical thinking
context.additional_context: Advanced AI/machine learning technical course for AI/ML practitioners

learning_goals: Learners can explain the application of the five stages of design thinking (Empathize-Define-Ideate-Prototype-Test) to mathematical problem-solving scenarios.
Learners can practice design thinking dispositions—such as openness, empathetic observation, and experimental approaches—during collaborative problem-solving and document reflections in a journal.
Learners can recognize the importance of design thinking dispositions in mathematical problem-solving and propose strategies for applying them to real-life issues.

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
